Literature.Title: Antimicrobial and Hemolytic Activity of Stapled Heptapeptide Dimers
Literature.Author: Luong HX, Kim DH, Lee BJ, Kim YW

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:9.7% Hemolysis=12.5 µM,Human erythrocytes:5.7% Hemolysis=6.3 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=4.7µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae ATCC 9752(MIC=6.3µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=4.7µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=9.4µg/ml)
